<h3>Standard Project Delivery Process</h3>

<p>The <strong>standard</strong> process for a USACE project requires two separate congressional authorizations — one for studying feasibility, and a subsequent one for construction — as well as appropriations for both. Congress generally considers an omnibus USACE authorization bill biannually. The bill is typically titled a Water Resources Development Act (WRDA). </p>

<p>Most water resource project authorizations in WRDAs fall into three categories</p>

<ol>
	<li>Project studies</li>
	<li>Construction projects</li>
	<li>Modifications to existing projects</li>
</ol>
